name: Devilbound Gnome
description: The Devilbound Gnome is a cunning small humanoid that embodies gnome ingenuity and fiendish malice, often seen with gleaming eyes and an air of dark mischief.
memorable: It can summon devils to the battlefield and possesses the ability to send creatures hurtling through Hell.
goals: Manipulate and control others, often operating on the darker edges of morality.
relations: Often has an imp bound to it as an ally, and can command devils during battle.
environment: Typically found in evil-aligned or fiendish settings.
strengths: Impressive Charisma and spellcasting abilities, high resistances to various damage types.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and has lower physical strength.
attacks: Uses Hellish Blast for fire and poison damage, calls devils with Hell's Servitors, and has a powerful ability to incapacitate foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to send creatures into Hell with To Hell and Back, causing substantial damage or incapacitation.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing it to see in dim light up to 60 feet.
skills: Highly skilled in Arcana, Deception, History, and Persuasion, showcasing its cunning nature.
additional_information: Has Magic Resistance, making it hard to affect with magical attacks.
Uses Infernal Blessing to enhance its survivability.
Can communicate telepathically with its imp across planes.
Sacrifices fiends to preserve its own life in combat.
Formidable foe with significant combat and manipulation capabilities.
spellcasting: Casts various spells like command, dimension door, and wall of fire, using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
test_queries: cunning small humanoid with fiendish powers
dark gnome able to send creatures to Hell
fiendbound gnome with fire and poison attacks
